diewald_shapeFile.files.shp
Class SHP_Header

java.lang.Object
  diewald_shapeFile.files.shp.SHP_Header

public class SHP_Header
extends java.lang.Object

Shape File Header Reader.

used for *.shp-files and *.shx-files.
contains information about:
...
Shape-Type
boundingbox
measure-range
...

Author:
thomas diewald (2012)
